name: Blocks Puzzle -- Lite
description:
Enjoys hours of fun with this simple match-3 block puzzle.

Place the different blocks shapes on the grid board. Fill up complete rows or columns to clear the line(s). Gain points by placing each blocks on the grid. Earn bonus points by removing more hen 1 line at a time. Use undo to re-position the block.

This free version is supported by 3rd party ads. Ads may use internet connectivity, and therefore subsequent data charges may apply. The photos/media/files permission is required to allow the game to save game data to external storage, and is sometimes used to cache ads.

Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games....
